Row.Text: Modern Era unit with high range and low mobility, very good at dealing high damage to enemy units.

Due to the unit's high range and low mobility, it can pick off enemy vessels from afar. Its better to use this unit to pick off other flapships. Unlike its counterpart, the Battle Cruiser doesnt have indirect fire and thus are better at open combat.

The Battle Cruiser was a large, highly immobilie, high ranged war ship that was mainly used as flag ships during wars. They were excellent at picking off ships from high range and fighting large vessles in open combat.
